channel.title: Just Thought I'd Share
channel.description:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4RtOdTjsc6U

item.title: Just Thought I'd Share
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I made something like this in my old RSPS (holds many different items with different rarities)… It wasn’t a donater only feature it was a money sink which would provide rares and other items, it was pretty good. I’m not sure if this deserves a thread though lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Just Thought I'd Share
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

enzo42:

You shouldn’t delete the box after you clicked it, if you walk away without choosing an option you lost the box for nothing.

He can always just delete the item after the item has been chosen, hence when the addItem method is called.

Read full topic

item.title: Just Thought I'd Share
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:10, topic:517881”][quote author=Jayden. link=topic=636145.msg4290351#msg4290351 date=1367100947]

seems sort of pointless when somebody can just auto donate - get the item just like that…

But instead off me having three different products on the website, I’ll just have this box.
[/quote]I can’t say I have ever seen somebody buy “partial nex”

But I guess there is always a first. or would you auto get three boxes?[/quote]

SoulSplit? They sell each nex part by them selves.

Read full topic

item.title: Just Thought I'd Share
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:517881”]I like the fact that you are experimenting, and please keep doing so, but I thought that Kalteen was not using any of those more recent armours?
I like the idea though, and these would be good for items such as “Potion Set,” “Food Set,” and perhaps a “Rune Weaponry Set.”
This is me just thinking, and I want you to correct any statement that you find incorrect:

[ul][li]With Torva and such in the game, each GP is going to be worth a lot less and will be easier to get than normal RuneScape by a very large factor.[/li]
[li]Donators can get the powerful items faster than non-donator players, or even be the only ones with access to some items.[/li][/ul][/quote]

This was just a side project, I’ve been working on; not too special though.

Sup22211:

Easy, nice bro

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Just Thought I'd Share
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I like the fact that you are experimenting, and please keep doing so, but I thought that Kalteen was not using any of those more recent armours?
I like the idea though, and these would be good for items such as “Potion Set,” “Food Set,” and perhaps a “Rune Weaponry Set.”
This is me just thinking, and I want you to correct any statement that you find incorrect:

[ul][li]With Torva and such in the game, each GP is going to be worth a lot less and will be easier to get than normal RuneScape by a very large factor.[/li]
[li]Donators can get the powerful items faster than non-donator players, or even be the only ones with access to some items.[/li][/ul]
